SimpleMono.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   SimpleMono.h
00006 
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   This abstract class simplifies the implementation of a basic
00010   monaural effect.  Inherit from it if your effect doesn't just
00011   modifies a track in place and doesn't care how many samples
00012   it gets at a time.  Your derived class only needs to implement
00013   GetEffectName, GetEffectAction, and ProcessSimpleMono.
00014 
00015 **********************************************************************/
00016 
00017 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_MONO__
00018 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_MONO__
00019 
00020 #include "Effect.h"
00021 
00022 class WaveTrack;
00023 
00024 class EffectSimpleMono:public Effect {
00025 
00026  public:
00027    virtual bool Process();
00028 
00029  private:
00030    bool ProcessOne(WaveTrack * t, sampleCount start, sampleCount end);
00031 
00032  protected:  
00033 
00034    // Override this method if you need to do things
00035    // before every track (including the first one)
00036    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00037 
00038    // Override this method to actually process audio
00039    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len) = 0;
00040 
00041    // Other useful information
00042    int    mCurTrackNum;
00043    double mCurRate;
00044    double mCurT0;
00045    double mCurT1;
00046    int    mCurChannel;
00047 
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif
